sentences.en: Alertness, calmness, courage : he could see them all in the youngster's face.
sentences.cn: 机警, 镇定, 胆量,都摆出在这年青人的脸上.

sentences.en: Caffeine can improve alertness and concentration in moderate doses.
sentences.cn: 咖啡因可以提高警觉及集中,如果摄入适量的话.

sentences.en: Elegant and graceful, the whole demeanor is one and inquiring alertness.
sentences.cn: 气质文雅而优美, 整体行为特征是和谐、好奇且机警.

sentences.en: Environmental issues such as noise and level of alertness may interfere with learning new behaviors.
sentences.cn: 环境问题诸如噪音和警戒的水平也许会妨碍新行为的学习。

sentences.en: Full of alertness, it is not easy to stay.
sentences.cn: 充满了警觉, 不容易停留.

sentences.en: Ginseng was reported to have increased energy and mental alertness.
sentences.cn: 人参可以增进体力和提高精神敏捷性.

sentences.en: I know him well in that mood of alertness and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 我对他这种警觉和猜疑的情绪是很熟悉的.

sentences.en: In a lotus posture you can keep alertness to the very end.
sentences.cn: 以莲花坐的姿势你就能保持警觉直至最尽头.

sentences.en: In large acre laser alertness, laser scattered by atmosphere was depended on.
sentences.cn: 在大面积激光警戒中, 主要是探测被大气散射的光.

sentences.en: In order to use the alertness approach in selecting a managerial style, you have to determine what each of your employees needs from you.
sentences.cn: 为了机敏地选择管理风格，你必须确定每一个下属的工作需求。 也就是他们到底需要你给予多少管控和/或鼓励？

sentences.en: Individual deviation in expected behavior causes arousal or alertness in others.
sentences.cn: 偏离预期的行为会激怒他人或使他人警觉.

sentences.en: Our Gini Coefficient has been reached to the international alertness line level.
sentences.cn: 我国基尼系数已超过了国际警戒线水平.

sentences.en: Participants rated their levels of anxiety, alertness and headache.
sentences.cn: 研究人员测量他们的焦虑 、 清醒及头痛程度.

sentences.en: The general impression is that of power, agility and alertness.
sentences.cn: 给人的一般印象是力量 、 敏捷和机警.

sentences.en: The order urged the armed forces to enhance their alertness.
sentences.cn: 该项命令敦促武装部队提高警惕.

sentences.en: We must maintain a military standard, an alertness, and never vary it.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保持军队的准则, 应当随时注意,切勿随时变动.
